


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.unit -->
<!-- @name    px2rem -->

# ```js px2rem ```


Convert rem value to a px one

## Parameters

- **em**  Number: The rem value to convert



## Example (js)

```js
import px2rem from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/unit/px2rem';
px2rem(36);
```
